ModMetaData.name: Better SoS2 holograms
ModMetaData.author: White_Phant0m
ModMetaData.description:
I felt like the holograms shouldn't require rest since they are, well... holograms, so, I've removed their need for rest.
I've kept their other needs since they were originally humanoids afterall.
If there are other needs that should be removed then do let me know.
